articles.author: Saloni Kothari
articles.title: BSE Sensex Rejig: Adani Ports To Replace Wipro In June - NDTV Profit
articles.description: The Asia Index Pvt. on Friday announced reconstitution results for its indices, which is effective from open on June 24.
articles.content: Adani Ports and Special Economic Zone Ltd. will be included in the S&P BSE Sensex from June 24, replacing IT major Wipro Ltd. from the index, as part of the reconstitution of the S&P BSE indi… [+1708 chars]

articles.author: Navdeep Singh
articles.title: IT stocks sink, dragging Sensex, Nifty to flat close - The Economic Times
articles.description: IT stocks closed lower amid concerns over tighter-for-longer US monetary policy.  Sensex settled at 75,410.39 while broader NSE Nifty ended at 22,957.  HDFC Bank, Bharti Airtel, L&T, Axis Bank, NTPC, and UltraTech Cement saw gains, while Tech Mahindra, Asian …
articles.content: After swinging between gains and losses, blue-chip equity indices closed flat on Friday, as IT stocks fell amid concerns that it would be a while before the US Federal Reserve cuts rates.The 30-share… [+3401 chars]
